body:
yes, correct.

here is the full list for reference:

```python
    'otherprop']
```

issue.title: class dictionary

repository.name: light-weight-refinenet
repository.description: Light-Weight RefineNet for Real-Time Semantic Segmentation

issue.body: Hi! I used the scripts in the colab to infer nyuv2 dataset (https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1S5wvuukFM6GTLbj8VxZFdkFn2jhdhiES). I also noticed the label dictionary in #16. However, default results I got from colab are colored labels which I cannot relate rgb information to label indexes. Could you provide a 40-class dictionary with corresponding colors?
